reviewtext: This is the battery to buy for use in those applications where you want to "set it and forget it." Or where you don't want to be having to change batteries at inopportune moments (like a digital camera). My particular use is for a indoor/outdoor digital thermometer. The outdoor sending unit is subjected to heat extremes and need to function even in subzero temps.These batteries will last several years there with no problem. Easily woth the extra money.
summary: Expensive, but they do have their applications
